title: I feel like there has suddenly been a spike in damage recently
body: I'm exploding quicker than normal. Are we witnessing damage creep or is it just me getting worse in skill level? Because I die so quickly recently that its becoming actually boring to play. Nothing more fun than making a single mistake and being bursted in less than a second...

replies.body: All the champs you play are either squishy mages like leblanc, squishy supports like janna or squishy adcs like missfortune.  If you make a single mistake you SHOULD be bursted and die instantly.
